effect.fr: Défaussez 2 cartes Énergie Water de votre main. Sinon, cette attaque ne fait rien.
effect.en: Discard 2 Water Energy cards from your hand. If you don't, this attack does nothing.
effect.es: Descarta 2 cartas de Energía Water de tu mano. Si no lo haces, este ataque no hace nada.
effect.it: Scarta due carte Energia Water che hai in mano. Se non lo fai, questo attacco non ha effetto.
effect.pt: Descarte 2 cartas de Energia Water da sua mão. Se não fizer isto, este ataque não fará nada.
effect.de: Lege 2 Water-Energiekarten aus deiner Hand auf deinen Ablagestapel. Wenn du das nicht machst, hat diese Attacke keine Auswirkungen.

description.en: This Pokémon has a jaw that's as sharp as a spear and as strong as steel. Apparently Barraskewda's flesh is surprisingly tasty, too.
